item.title: The RCMP is DONE! [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ March 28, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew do a deep dive into the recently leaked and heavily redacted RCMP document concerning serious immanent threats to Canada's democracy. Sadly, the document shows that the RCMP's quasi-independence is done; it's over. The RCMP has proven time and time again that they are now agents of the State Regime, and we need to come to terms with that truth and proceed accordingly. 

But do not despair, friends, for Christ has overcome the world, for HE is RISEN! HAPPY EASTER!

[Segment 1] - The Secret RCMP Report (06:20 - 43:12):
"RCMP Whole of Government: Five-Year Trends for Canada" | DocumentCloud: https://s3.documentcloud.org/documents/24512494/rcmp-whole-of-government-five-year-trends-for-canada.pdf;
"Secret RCMP Report Warns Canadians May Revolt Once They Realize How Broke They Are" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/opinion/secret-rcmp-report-warns-canadians-may-revolt-once-they-realize-how-broke-they-are;
"Secret RCMP Memo Blames Everyone but the Liberals for Canada’s Misery" | LifeSite News: https://www.lifesitenews.com/opinion/secret-rcmp-memo-blames-everyone-but-the-liberals-for-canadas-misery;

[Segment 2] - Analyzing the Report (45:56 - END):

item.title: LD NEWS BRIEF: 03/27/2024 [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch: NEWS BRIEF ~ March 27, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch NEWS BRIEF, host Andrew DeBartolo breaks down Canadian news, culture, and politics from a distinctly Christian, Conservative, and Canadian perspective.

Episode Resources:
"Conservative Motion of Non-Confidence" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2024/03/21/conservative-motion-of-non-confidence
"Liberals Undecided: Carbon Tax After 2030" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2024/03/25/liberals-undecided-carbon-tax-after-2030
Chrystia Freeland's Dodge | The Canadian Independent via Twitter: https://twitter.com/canindependent/status/1770895035451474353
PM Trudeau "Democratic Decline" | TNC News via Twitter: https://twitter.com/TrueNorthCentre/status/1770924834282721744
"Liberals Gifted WEF $500,000 to Produce Favourable Report on Carbon Tax Report" | Rebel News: https://www.rebelnews.com/liberals_gifted_wef_500_000_to_produce_favourable_report_on_carbon_tax_report
"Election Date, MP Pensions" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2024/03/24/election-date-mp-pensions

"Watch: Manitoba MP Proclaims Christian Gospel to House of Commons" | Western Standard: https://www.westernstandard.news/watch/watch-manitoba-mp-proclaims-christian-gospel-to-house-of-commons/53308

item.title: Canada's CORRUPT Elites HATE You! [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ March 14, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew dive deep into two MASSIVE SCANDALS -Winnipeg Lab Leak & ArriveCan APP- both of which implicate the Trudeau Regime of massive corruption and incompetence, both of which they are trying to cover up. TUNE IN TO HEAR WHAT THE TRUDEAU-FUNDED MSM WON'T TELL YOU.

[Segment 1] - The Scientist - The Winnipeg Virologist Connected to Carona Virus Gain-of-Function and Lab Leak:
Lab Leak Story by Shiela Gunn Reid | Rebel News Online: https://twitter.com/RebelNewsOnline/status/1767346546763547100;
Winnipeg lab firing documents released | CBC News: https://www.cbc.ca/news/politics/winnipeg-lab-firing-documents-released-china-1.7128865;

[Segment 2] - The Cover-up:
Trudeau govt virologists who transferred Ebola to Wuhan had clandestine relationship with Chinese | Zero Hedge: https://www.zerohedge.com/political/trudeau-govt-virologists-who-transferred-ebola-wuhan-had-clandestine-relationship-chinese;
Liberals, NDP shut down committee probing fired scientists | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/liberals-ndp-shut-down-committee-probing-fired-scientists?taid=65e6487672a63d00014ba003;
Liberals, NDP shut down investigation into Winnipeg lab | True North: https://tnc.news/2024/03/04/liberals-ndp-shut-investigation-winnipeg-lab2;

[Segment 3] - ArriveSCAM:
Auditor General of Canada | Office of the Auditor General: https://www.oag-bvg.gc.ca/internet/English/parl_oag_202402_01_e_44428.html;
Accountants afraid to speak | Blacklock's Reporter: https://www.blacklocks.ca/accountants-afraid-to-speak;
RCMP investigates Trudeau’s $60 million ArriveCAN boondoggle | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/rcmp-investigates-trudeaus-60-million-arrivecan-boondoggle?utm_content=;
Companies tied to ArriveCAN scandal banned from bidding on federal contracts | CTV News: https://www.ctvnews.ca/politics/companies-tied-to-arrivecan-scandal-banned-from-bidding-on-federal-contracts-1.6796927;
